attributes.action: Reinstate the air bridge between Spain and the UK
attributes.additional_details: Reinstating the air bridge between the UK and Spain is vital to the economy and the aviation industry. Spain has had outbreaks in certain parts of the country, which have been controlled, and it is unfair to tarnish the whole of Spain for the few outbreaks concentrated in one area.
attributes.background: Reinstate the air bridge between Spain and the UK and test passengers upon arrival in the UK from countries of concern.
